Text.Page:
You're very lucky. Not many get the chance to rub shoulders with a world-famous scholar such as myself. Don't feign shock! You know my name! Everyone knows my name.

As it happens, I do have a need for an assistant. There are a number of relics I'm after.

They're not lostâ€”I know precisely where they are. I'll mark them on your map! See? "You need me to collect them?"

You're brighter than you appear. Precisely!

You bring me those relics and I'll make sure you're invited to stand near the building where I give my glorious report.

Time is fame, as they say, so don't dawdle.

I'll be here, doing important things....

Splendidly done. I should consider hiring someone like you more often. This will show those stuffed shirts at the Mysterium how foolish they were to turn away me, Eustace, from their ranks.

At least, I really hope it does. Although it may take me some time to look over these finds.
You're wasting valuable time. We need those relics if I'm to be famous!
